H0.text: Safety goggles are used to keep mold spores from entering the respiratory system.

H1.text: A breathing mask is the piece of safety equipment used to keep mold spores from entering the respiratory system.

H2.text: Rubber gloves are the safety equipment used to keep mold spores from entering the respiratory system.

H3.text: Lead apron is the piece of safety equipment used to keep mold spores from entering the respiratory system.

A4.text: An N95 respirator is a disposable filtering facepiece respirator or reusable elastomeric respirator filter that meets the U.S. National Institute for Occupational Safety and Health (NIOSH) N95 standard of air filtration, filtering at least 95% of airborne particles that have a mass median aerodynamic diameter of 0.3 micrometers under 42 CFR 84, effective July 1995.
